attributes.action: not accept the olympic torch on the 6th April outside No 10 Downing Street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK should not condone a series of events, to which british athletes will take part of, in a country that conducts systematic human rights abuses

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
